page.title: 04WORKINGTON REDS DEFENDER
page.content: Martin Gaffney (27) has been playing for Workington Reds for 3 years.His ambition is to win the Multipart League. He has already helped to win the Presidents Cup, the most memorable momemt of his career. The worst moment of his career was being turned down as a schoolboy by Wolves.His favourite player is Bobby Moore.Unlike most players,he does not have any superstitions.He does not have any footballing relations. His career began as a schoolboy at Wolves,moving to Bury, where he played in the Central League in many famous grounds, such as The Baseball Ground, Villa Park (where he played against Andy Gray),and many others,including St.James's Park where he scored his best goal.He next played for Carlisle City and now for Workington Reds and Cockermouth part-time.
